name: DailyQuotes
0:
”Alexa, Open Daily Quotes”
”Alexa, Open Daily Quotes and tell me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily quotes
des:
A positive quote has the power to make your day a better one. 

'Daily Quotes' is tailor-made just for that. It gives you a quote from fiction, non-fiction, great people, companies. It has an ever-building database of quotes which will make sure you get a new one most of the time. You can now impress people by quoting the wise wisdom from these quotes. 

To access 'Daily Quotes':

- Install this skill through your Alexa app.
- Ask Alexa to 'Open Daily Quotes'
- Enjoy the quote :)

It is that simple! You can use other utterances to get a quote once you have opened the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
